Package cdx.opencdx.commons.aspects

Class AuditAspect

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.commons.aspects.AuditAspect
@EnableAspectJAutoProxy public class AuditAspect extends Object
Spring AOP implementation for Audit Messages.

    • getCurrentThreadInfo

      public static RequestActorAttributes getCurrentThreadInfo() throws OpenCDXBadRequest
      Static Method to getting the current thread information stored for audit.
      Returns:
      RequestActorAttributes with the actor and patient informaiton.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXBadRequest - Thrown when not audit information for thread is found.

    • setCurrentThreadInfo

      public static void setCurrentThreadInfo(String actor, String patient)

      Parameters:

      patient - String containing the patient id
